title: No Calls
author: ezekg
aiHeadline: Breaking News: 'No Calls' Policy Implemented, Because Let's Be Real, Who Actually Enjoys Talking on the Phone Anyway, It's 2025 and We All Prefer Texting, Unless You're Trying to Scam Someone, Then by All Means, Make That Call

title: David Lynch has died
author: wut42
aiHeadline: RIP David Lynch, the Legendary Director Who Brought Us Twin Peaks and a Lot of Other Stuff That Was Really Weird and Confusing, But in a Good Way, Mostly, and Now He's Gone, Leaving Us to Figure Out the Meaning of Life Without Him

title: Nintendo announces the Switch 2 [video]
author: HelloUsername
aiHeadline: Get Ready for the Next Generation of Gaming with the Nintendo Switch 2, Which Will Probably Sell Out in Like 2 Seconds and Leave You Wondering Why You Even Bothered Trying to Buy One, But Hey, at Least the Trailer Looks Cool, So There's That

title: Nokia's internal presentation after iPhone was launched (2007) [pdf]
author: late
aiHeadline: Blast from the Past: Nokia's 2007 Internal Presentation After the iPhone Launch Reveals the Company's Utter Confusion and Desperation, Like a Teenager Trying to Figure Out How to Use Snapchat, and It's Honestly Kind of Sad, But Also Hilarious in a 'We Know How This Story Ends' Kind of Way

title: I ditched the algorithm for RSS
author: DearNarwhal
aiHeadline: Revolutionary Move: Someone Ditches the Algorithm for RSS, Because Who Needs Suggestions from a Robot When You Can Have a Bunch of Random News Feeds to Scroll Through, It's Like the Digital Equivalent of Channel Surfing, but Without the Satisfaction of Actually Finding Something Good
